version_description:
Updated License Agreement.
New links for support and privacy policy

Updated License Agreement.
New links for support and privacy policy

Updated License Agreement.
New links for support and privacy policy

Updated License Agreement.
New links for support and privacy policy

Updated License Agreement.
New links for support and privacy policy

- iOS 7 compatible with an updated look & feel
- Full 64bit support for newer devices
- App now requires at least iOS 6 or higher
- Augmented Reality View (on supported devices)
- Online only search mode, no offline data required
- You may now choose to install multiple offline datasets
- You can now refine search by type, category, or keyword
- Frequently Asked Questions now available in Help
- Use alternative directions providers (Google Maps, TomTom, etc.)
- View location telephone numbers and place calls from within the App
- View location web URL’s and launch venue website from within the App
- Long press on details information to copy to the clipboard
- Hide the list view on iPad for a full screen map experience
- View location names where available
- Show location type and category
- Ability to load results at much higher zoom levels
- New 'overflow' menu for additional items

• Redesigned user interface making it easier to locate hotspots, get directions, and navigate
• New one touch navigation to XFINITY WiFi hotspots
• Near me hotspot list grouped by type (outdoor, café, etc.)
• Speed and performance improvements
• Improved online and offline results loading for better accuracy
• Support for Google Street view if Google Maps is installed

• Additional functionality to prioritize and connect to preferred networks when available
• Text displayed in your list of available networks to notify you when XFINITY WiFi is available and you’re connected
• Enhanced WiFi security and privacy features
•Option to enable GPS only while using the XFINITY WiFi app

Your privacy is important. We’ve made it easier to learn about Xfinity’s privacy practices in this latest release. Visit us at Xfinity.com/privacy.
